ComicInfo.Summary:
In Un/Sacred Vol 2, Mirka and her special guests invite you once again into the world of Angelina and Damianoâ€¦and Eden, the new arrival in the family! PEACH MOMOKO joins her on cover art this issue to push the boundaries of this sensual universe even further.
